long_description: The Scott Contessa Speedster 15 women's road bike features a speedy, efficient design and dependable Shimano 105 components to ensure the miles pass swiftly, whether training or out on a social ride. Hydroformed, double-butted 6061 aluminum frame boasts aerodynamic tube shaping and internal cable routing for sleek performance. Carbon fork with alloy steerer tube reduces weight and helps damp energy-draining road vibrations. Compact Shimano 105 crankset is paired with a wide-ranging 12-30 cassette for 20 easy-spinning gear combinations to handle every ride, from steep hills to speedy pursuits. Shimano 105 derailleurs and shifters ensure precise shifts and dependable performance. Alex Race aero-profiled rims are wrapped with Schwalbe Lugano tires to deliver great road feel, grip and low rolling resistance. Pedals sold separately. Specs on the Scott Contessa Speedster 15 women's road bike are subject to change.
short_description: The Scott Contessa Speedster 15 women's road bike features a speedy, efficient design and dependable Shimano 105 components to ensure the miles pass swiftly, whether training or out on a social ride.
